Package org.dgfoundation.amp.visibility.data

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FMSettings
    Feature Manager Settings Interface to follow to be included in FMSettingsMediator automatic processing
    RuleBasedData  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColumnsVisibility
    Detects which columns are visible in Activity Form and can be further used, e.g.
    DataVisibility
    Provides common support for visibility detection, at the moment for report columns and measures.
    FMSettingsMediator
    Single point of reference for all FM settings groups
    FMTree
    A simple representation of an FM section in a tree structure
    GenericVisibility
    Generic Visibility that simply reflects FM as is, no custom rules
    MeasuresVisibility
    Detects which measures are visible in Activity Form and can be further used, e.g.
    MenuVisibility
    Detects visible Menu Entries.
    ModulesVisibility
    Detects which main FM modules are enabled, that depends on root module being enabled
    RuleBasedVisibility
    A rule based visibility base class
    VisibilitySourceOptions
    possible values for the GlobalSettings value which dictates the source of visibility for a ReportWizard item (Measures - as of 15/April/2015)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataVisibility.DataMapType
